--- editor_options: chunk_output_type: console --- # Facility Affiliations {#sec-affiliations} This is the facility affiliations data publicly reported in the __Provider Data Catalog__. ### Metadata ::: {.cell} 
      [ROWS] 1557102 
     [PAGES] 779 
    [FIELDS] 9 
    [ISSUED] 2023-08-17 
  [MODIFIED] 2025-04-18 
  [RELEASED] 2025-05-01 
[DICTIONARY] https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/27ea-46a8#data-dictionary 
      [SITE] https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/dataset/27ea-46a8 
  [DOWNLOAD] https://data.cms.gov/provider-data/sites/default/files/resources/b7c4080ae144663e43353a9c35cd3f53_1744999531/Facility_Affiliation.csv
::: ### Dictionary ::: {.cell} 
npi
Unique clinician ID assigned by NPPES

ind_pac_id
Unique individual clinician ID assigned by PECOS

provider_last_name
Individual clinician last name

provider_first_name
Individual clinician first name

provider_middle_name
Individual clinician middle name

suff
Individual clinician suffix

facility_type
Facilities can fall into the following type
categories: Hospitals, Long-term Care Hospital,
Nursing Home, Inpatient Rehabilitation Facility,
Home Health Agency, Hospice, Dialysis Facility

facility_affiliations_certification_number
Medicare CCN of facility type or unit within
hospital where an individual clinician provides
service

facility_type_certification_number
Medicare CCN of the primary hospital where
individual clinician provides service, should the
clinician provide services in a unit within the
hospital
::: ## Data ::: {.cell}
